pages.about_ancorp_one: AN Corp is a premier engineering and construction company in the state of Telangana, dedicated to providing top-quality services to its clients and customers.
pages.about_ancorp_two: The State Government is committed to promote the state of Telangana as a hub for engineering and construction industries in the country.
pages.about_ancorp_three: AN Corp is a leading engineering and construction company in the state of Telangana. We specialize in building infrastructure, such as roads, bridges, and buildings, as well as providing services related to construction management and design.
pages.about_ancorp_four: To provide seamless and reliable engineering and construction services for the public and private sectors, thereby enhancing efficiency, safety, and sustainability of infrastructure.
pages.about_ancorp_five: To create a robust engineering and construction eco-system for enhancing competitiveness and productivity of the key economic sectors affecting the lives of the majority of the population of the state of Telangana.
pages.projects_msg: AN Corp has excelled in achieving great success on numerous engineering and construction projects
pages.services_msg: AN Corp provides various services for its clients which range from engineering and construction management to design
